column4: I need a Linux calendering app that will reliably sync my halendar with a handheld PDA. I'm willing to buy any PDA on the market and switch to any PIM (I presently use Evolution) -- I just need to be able to carry my calendar around in my pocket. Any recommendations?
I'm told palmpilots sync with ubuntu
Palm doesn't make those anymore -- just the Treos. My last Treo, a 650, did NOT synch reliably with Evolution
